markers.marker: Tomoko starts the game.
Tomoko thinks she'll get bukkake'd if she loses.
Tomoko decides to cheat for the entire game by hiding cards in her sleeve.
Tomoko sees her first boy strip.
Tomoko internally complains about people making her strip
Tomoko makes an awkward joke about having a dick
Tomoko sees her first dick.
Tomoko asks somebody to impress her by taking off a large article of clothing.
Tomoko has just joined the game.
Tomoko makes a cringeworthy poop joke.
Tomoko sees her first vagina.
Tomoko worries that Streaming-chan will get her stream banned if she's lewd.
Tomoko asks how many views Streaming-chan has.
Tomoko reveals that people used to call her the Queen... (she doesn't explain the nickname was given by children.)
Tomoko thinks about Chazz and if he'd be her friend.
Tomoko casually asks what everyone would do if an armed person entered the room.
Tomoko ponders what type of Gym Leader she'd be in Pokemon.
Tomoko gets a nosebleed.
Tomoko asks to sniff somebodies clothing.
Tomoko makes an awkward comment about her own tits.
Tomoko tells a cringey story about her past in order to try and make everyone laugh.
Tomoko curiously asks Moon about a Gardevoir's privates.
Tomoko claims that tit size is based on how much sexual activity you have.
Tomoko complains about God being worthless if he doesn't give her good cards.
